ThingDef.label: elixir of grave resurrection
ThingDef.description:
An elixir prepared by a alchemist, resurrects the ingestor upon death, healing wounds in the process.

Due to the nature of these elixirs, the resurrection effect will only work once.

Ingesting this elixir will also increase alchemical toxicity by 2.5%, regardless of quality level.

HediffDef.label: elixir of grave resurrection
HediffDef.description: An elixir prepared by a alchemist, causes the ingestor to release clouds of corrosive gas upon taking damage, weakening the elixir at the same time.
